## OnElementResizedInfo.borderBoxSize property

The border box size. See [What is the CSS box model](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn_web_development/Core/Styling_basics/Box_model#what_is_the_css_box_model) for more information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
borderBoxSize: ResizeObserverSize;
```
